### Automatic Transfer Switch Procurement
---

#### Project Title
Automatic Transfer Switches for Canada Centre of Inland Waters

#### Solicitation Title
KW405-230410

#### Amendment #3 - Clarification of Tenders

### Project Overview
The Department of the Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking bids for the supply of (2) 600V 1200A automatic transfer switches for the electrical systems at the Canada Centre of Inland Waters.

### Mandatory Technical Criteria
Bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with each of the following **mandatory technical criteria**:

- Meets or exceeds the specifications for 600V 1200A automatic transfer switches
- Adheres to relevant Canadian Electrical Code standards

 FAILURE TO DEMONSTRATE COMPLIANCE WILL RESULT IN THE OFFER BEING DEEMED NON-RESPONSIVE AND GIVEN NO FURTHER CONSIDERATION

### Tender Information

- *Notice URL*: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14551401?extsite=MTQ1NTE0MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
- *Contact Information*: Christopher Casale (Christopher.Casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, 343-575-5249)
- *Bid Submittal Deadline*: December 2, 2022, by 14:00 EST. *All bid submittals received after this time will be deemed non-responsive.*

### Amendment to Tender Description
Please disregard the original closing time listed in the Ariba Discovery posting. Bids and required documentation must be received by December 2, 2022, by 14:00 EST.

### Notice of Award
The project will be awarded based on the **lowest price** submitted by bidders. Bidders are required to sign an agreement respecting the *Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)* as well as other free trade agreements indicated above in Table 1.

#### Trade Agreements
The following trade agreements are applicable for this project:

- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
